Much that I do understand this is a VERY sexualized parody of real life, the author raises some interesting questions in this series.  While I was shocked that Akira was the girl who provoked the whole mess - it's the romantic in me; the idea of such a pretty girl being the villain of the series rather offended me - the fact that she was able to get hold of a MILITARY GRADE CHEMICAL WARFARE AGENT to use on her peers ultimately puts the blame on everything at the school at her father's feet, not hers.  Given how promiscuous his late wife was and how much of an influence on Akira she had, warning signs should have gone up...

Unless Mr. Ichijô WANTED Akira to turn her peers into sex-crazed loons.

Why?

The possibilities are endless.  He might have decided that having his daughter (and heir) follow his wife's footsteps would create one hell of a huge scandal, thus shoving her off to some remote island and keeping her there (and away from the media) would keep things quiet.

Who knows...!

To those who question the logistics of eating it's rather simple. They more then likely trade for food, likely the main export would be "favors" or kids and babys. After all the amount of cream pies in this series could be for that purpose. An it's not as though it would be a new low for them.
